titleStmt.title: Some observations made upon the herb cassiny imported from Carolina shewing its admirable virtues in curing the small pox / written by a physitian in the countrey to Esq. Boyle at London.
titleStmt.author: Peachi, John, fl. 1683.
Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.
Pechey, John, 1655-1716.

notesStmt.note: Attributed also to John Pechey--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
